alert.note: Alert for Grainger; Greene; Hamblen; Hancock; Hawkins (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 25 at 2:59AM CDT until March 25 at 3:45AM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Hawkins County in east Tennessee... South central Hancock County in east Tennessee... Northwestern Greene County in east Tennessee... Northeastern Grainger County in east Tennessee... Central Hamblen County in east Tennessee... * Until 445 AM EDT. * At 359 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Rutledge to near New Market, moving east at 70 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Morristown, Rogersville, Rutledge, Bean Station, Surgoinsville, Russellville, Church Hill, Mosheim, Bulls Gap and Baileyton. This includes Interstate 81 in Tennessee between mile markers 26 and 40. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
